mapper.update: update mybatis.users set effective_end_date = sysdate() where user_id = #{userId} and sysdate() in (effective_start_date, ifnull(effective_end_date, sysdate()))
mapper.select: select * from mybatis.users where sysdate() in (ifnull(effective_start_date, sysdate()), ifnull(effective_end_date, sysdate())) and (user_id = #{userId} or #{userId} is null)
select * from users where (ACCOUNT = #{userAccount} or phone_number = #{userAccount} or email = #{userAccount}) and password = #{pwd}
mapper.insert: insert into mybatis.users(phone_number, email, account, password, user_name, role, team_id, register_date, last_login_date, effective_start_date, effective_end_date, user_id) values (#{phoneNumber}, #{email}, #{account}, #{password}, #{userName}, #{role}, #{teamId}, #{registerDate}, #{lastLoginDate}, #{effectiveStartDate}, #{effectiveEndDate}, #{userId})
